locator = ('xpath', "//div[text()='Work Mode']/following-sibling::div/div/label/span[2]"), value = 'Remote'

    def click_button(self, locator, value: str):
        elements = self.driver.find_elements(*locator)
        for element in elements:
            if element.get_attribute("value") == str(value):
                input_id = element.get_attribute("id")
                try:
                    label = self.driver.find_element(By.XPATH, f"//label[@for='{input_id}']")
                    label.click()
                    return
                except:
                    raise Exception(f"Label not found for input id: {input_id}")
